thread.section_title: FreedomVoice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FreedomVoice | www.freedomvoice.com | 2 of 20
thread.title: CreaseBeastLax

author: CreaseBeastLax
title: CreaseBeastLax
text: I have been using FreedomVoice for just about 2 weeks. My calls are always because I have set something up incorrectly. Each time I call, the customer care reps know exactly how to help and our very patient with me as I figure everything out. I look forward to calling customer care because the process is quick and efficient and they are always kind.
